title: Drawing, "Design for Woven Textile "These Were the Days of Our Summer, Now the Days Are Grey""
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Abstract landscape of sand and sky in bright orange and yellow organic shapes with brown and gray hip-rooved house at lower right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Woven Textile "These Were the Days of Our Summer, Now the Days Are Grey"".
Graphite, pastel/crayon on white paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-112.
